com.koucha.experimentalgame.rendering.lwjgl

Class LWJGLRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koucha.experimentalgame.rendering.lwjgl.LWJGLRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer

    public class LWJGLRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderer
    Implements Renderer using LWJGL with OpenGL

    • Method Detail

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Description copied from interface: Renderer
        Cleans up all the resources reserved by the renderer

        Should be as soon as the renderer isn't used anymore

        Graphics interfaces used by renderers often work outside of the garbage collector. Because of that, this method should be used to avoid memory leaks etc.

        Specified by:
        cleanUp in interface Renderer
